snippet: Investors reacted to a Commerce Department report that retail sales rose 1.1 percent last month, indicating a gain in consumer confidence.
abstract: Stocks rise after strong gain in retail spending suggests consumers are gaining confidence in economy.
lead_paragraph: Investors reacted to a Commerce Department report that retail sales rose 1.1 percent last month, indicating a gain in consumer confidence.

headline.seo: Stocks Rise on Consumer Spending Report
headline.main: Shares Rise on Signs of Resurgent Consumer
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise on Signs Of Resurgent Consumer
